downloadTitle: Enterprise Project Management deployments: The Executive Connection
downloadDescription: Chris Vandersluis discusses the role of executives in Enterprise Project Management deployments.
detailsSection: Project-management expert Chris Vandersluis discusses what causes executives to be more or less involved in EPM deployments. He makes recommendations regarding what executive involvement should be required by organizations.
systemRequirementsSection: To download and read this paper, you must have Microsoft Office Word 2007. You can also use Office Word 2003 or Word XP and the Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack.
installInstructionSection: Click Download, and then save the file to your computer. Open the file in Word to read and print it.
